description: React component for a Kanban board column, managing cards, editing, deleting, and UI interactions

methods.name: KanbanColumn
methods.description: React functional component for displaying a Kanban column with cards, actions, and UI controls

methods.name: handleAddCard
methods.description: Handles adding a new card to the column

methods.name: handleDeleteColumn
methods.description: Handles deleting the entire column after user confirmation
